<h2 id="generative">Generative</h2>

<h3 id="trees">Have a Tree</h3>
<p>
Geometric patterns made by growing lines at various angles and decay rates. Play with the system for yourself <a href='http://mm218.shinyapps.io/have_a_tree'>at this link!</a>
</p>

<div>
<a data-title="Clear Directions: A geometric pattern in the shape of arrows" data-lightbox="generative" href="./generative/trees/arrow_bg.jpg"><img alt="Clear Directions: A geometric pattern in the shape of arrows" src="./generative/trees/thumbs/arrow_bg.jpg" class="generative" type="image/jpeg" /></a>
